title: Power analysis: Gravel racing is getting faster as record times fall at Crusher in the Tushar
content:
Diving into the power numbers of Keegan Swenson and Sofía Gómez Villafañe at Crusher in the Tushar.

Read the full article at Power analysis: Gravel racing is getting faster as record times fall at Crusher in the Tushar on Velo.
author: Will Tracy
